summary: Changes Level up sound to more Fantasy Like.
descriptionHtml:
Fantasy Level Up Sound
----------------------

I didn\'t like the default leveling sounds so I inserted my own.

[url=http://youtu.be/I_KHpyNspZQ][color=blue]Youtube Sample Version 1[/color][/url]

[url=http://youtu.be/xb3bHXYxVjc][color=blue]Youtube Sample Version 2[/color][/url]

[url=http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=5c2Vb7CqTdc][color=blue]Youtube Sample Version 3[/color][/url] - Final Fantasy IX - 3:05 (Not my video thanks to guy that made that)

Installation
------------

Pick a version you like and Extract the sound folder to your 
Data folder of Skyrim for example: C:\\Program Files\\Skyrim\\Data
Overwrite files if asked and enjoy!

All done!


Uninstallation
--------------

Delete the file that was in the Rar.


Details
-------

It is a Sound from Final Fantasy ( Well at least I think...)

The Rar contains 3 Version.

Version 1 22 Seconds - Fanfare 1 from the Chrono Trigger OVA.
Version 1 Short 13 Seconds
Version 2 13 Seconds
Version 3 11 Seconds - Final Fantasy IX Victory Fanafare

Changelog
-------

V1.2  Added Version 3

V1.1  Added Version 2 and Shorter Version 1

V1.0  Initial Release


Credits
-------

Made by Rizumu (miyuutje)

Thanks to the creators of the music I use.

Tools used :

Windows Movie Maker for the Youtube Video and some music converting tool.



~Have Fun! Hope you like it!
author: Rizumu
